CustomField.formula: /* Updated as per 2023 Comp Profiles -AN Feb 4 2023 */ /* Updated as per 2022 Comp Profiles -AN Feb 5 2022 */ /* Updated Comp Profiles for Anesthesia\EMS as per new comp rules -AN July 8 2021 */ /* Updated Comp Profiles for Anesthesia as per new comp rules -AN JAN 25 2021 */ /* Updated Comp Profiles for Australia as per new comp rules -AN May 8 2021 */ /* Updated Comp Profiles for surgical Canada -AN May 15 2020 */ /* Updated as per 2020 Comp Profiles -AN Feb 5 2020 */ /* Updated as per 2019 Comp Profiles -AN Feb 11 2019 */ /* Updated LATAM Comp Profiles -AN March 26 2019 */ CASE(Compensation_Profile__c, "Alt Care Urology","All Products", "Alt Care","All Other,Focus", "Alt Care ISR","All Other,Focus", "Anesthesia","All Products,Laryngoscopes", "Anesthesia Canada","Core,Focus", "Anesthesia Military","Core", "Anesthesia Military Rep","Focus", "SBM Pain Management","Focus,Core", "DTAC","Core,Focus", "DTAC IS","Core,Focus", "Tactical","All Products", "EM","All Other,Control Plus,EZIO", "EMISR","All Other", "Australia\NZ","Core,Focus,All Products,ANZ Uro All Products", "Interventional MCS","IABC,IABP", "Interventional Access Canada","Core,Focus", "Interventional Coronary","Coronary", "Interventional Structural Heart","Structural Heart", "Interventional ISR","All Products", "Surgical Canada","Canada All Products", "Surgical Disposables","SURD All Products", "Surgical Instruments","SURI All Products,SPIF", "Surgical Inside Sales","Core,Focus", "Surgical Bariatrics","Internal Stapling", "Urology","All Other,Focus", "Vascular","Core,Focus", "Vascular Canada","Core,Focus", "Latin America","All Products", "All Products" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field used to build out Empty Quota's. There are 6 Profiles that use "All Products" so that is the default.
CustomField.label: Quota Compensation Type
